channel.title: Making a monster shoot a projectile?
channel.description: [s]anyone know the gfx id for jad's mage projectile id?[/s] How would I make an npc shoot a projectile flying towards the player such as an arrow

item.title: Making a monster shoot a projectile?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.source: Making a monster shoot a projectile?

item.title: Making a monster shoot a projectile?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You’ll need to instantiate a new NPC before you use it so you can get their coords.
Then:

int enemyx = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int enemyy = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
createProjectile(enemyy, enemyx, 0, 0, 50, 80, movingGFXID, 43, 31, playerId);

That should do it.

You’ll have to substitute movingGFXID with the gfx ID, however.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a monster shoot a projectile?

item.title: Making a monster shoot a projectile?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

I’m no good with the createProjectile methods so can you help me fill those out so the monster does that?

item.source: Making a monster shoot a projectile?

item.title: Making a monster shoot a projectile?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

createProjectile(enemyY, enemyX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, movingGFXID, startheight, endheight, playerId_to_lock_onto);

All the arguments are ints.

Read full topic
